Control Name: 5.1.5 Ensure that logging for Azure KeyVault is 'Enabled'
Control Statement: Enable AuditEvent logging for key vault instances to ensure interactions with key vaults are logged and available.

control_attributes.description: Enable AuditEvent logging for key vault instances to ensure interactions with key vaults are logged and available.
